html:
Subscribe to The Cooligans

Apple Podcasts | Spotify | YouTube

Christian Polanco and Alexis Guerreros react to Liverpool‚Äôs shocking draw against Manchester United. The boys also discuss whether Liverpool would be better off cashing in and selling Trent Alexander-Arnold in this transfer window.

Christian and Alexis then recap all the other big matches around Europe including Arsenal‚Äôs draw to Brighton and Real Madrid‚Äôs comeback against Valencia.

Later, Christian and Alexis react to the weekend‚Äôs viral soccer moments in Run That Back.

(6:10) - Liverpool draw Manchester United 2-2

(27:45) - Arsenal draw Brighton 1-1

(36:50) - Recapping other premier league results

(42:30) - Real Madrid def. Valencia 2-1

(50:20) - Run That Back: Manu Kon√© photoshops Lazio player faces on his children

(55:00) - Run That Back: Ligue 2 player posts photo of him driving past face planted player
